title: How A Complete Unknown turned New Jersey in to 1960s New York City
description: 'A Complete Unknown' production designer Fran√ßois Audouy reveals how he was able to successfully make Hoboken and Jersey City, NJ look like New York's West Village from the 1960s.
excerpt: "With a story like this, you do feel an immense amount of responsibility to not (mess) it up."
